backend/AltSignup.mo: Simple signup handler with basic empty-field validation and simulated success response.
backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles with access control checks for saving, retrieving, and deleting caller data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, descriptions, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global stylesheet; currently empty in this snapshot.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML setting fonts and initializing II_URL before loading the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Declares alternative origins allowed for Internet Identity derivation.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA redirect page that forwards unknown routes to index.html.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root layout and route definitions for all main pages including signup-test.
frontend/src/auth/iiConfig.ts: Shared Internet Identity auth configuration providing client creation and login options with derivation origin and II URL handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthDiagnos: Debug panel displaying detailed authentication status, timing info, platform data, and stall detection.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthErrorPa: Error UI showing a message with optional retry and return-to-landing actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPopupHe: Help panel explaining popup-blocking issues for Internet Identity with retry and direct-link options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Status banner showing current auth step, timing, terminal outcomes, and retry or direct II actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/CanisterWar: Banner indicating backend warmup status with warming, ready, or failure states and retry support.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Handler for II authorize callbacks that routes users based on onboarding status and session flags.
frontend/src/components/auth/PatchedInte: Wrapper loading II config before rendering InternetIdentityProvider with safe options.
frontend/src/components/auth/UsernamePas: Empty placeholder file for a username/password auth form.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedHea: Header for authenticated pages with logout and account deletion logic tied to II, backend, and local state resets.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Root layout wrapping the app in onboarding context and II authorization callback handler.
frontend/src/components/TaskModal.tsx: Modal showing a task with a configurable timer, supporting start/pause/resume and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/config/ai.ts: Deprecated AI config returning empty defaults and warning users to use the proxy client.
frontend/src/contexts/OnboardingResultCo: React context storing onboarding answers and AI results, persisted to localStorage with hydration and clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and maintains a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthAttemptGuard.t: Tracks user-initiated auth attempts with timestamps, correlation IDs, and sessionStorage flags to manage flow state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthFlowDiagnostic: Provides detailed step-by-step auth flow tracking with timing, correlation IDs, slow-step detection, and logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanisterWarmup.ts: Stub warmup hook that marks canister as ready when the actor is available, with optional auto-start and retry.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity auth, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useMobileInternetIden: Mobile-safe II login hook that pre-initializes AuthClient and returns structured success/error outcomes.
Provides a mobile-safe Internet Identity login hook that pre-initializes AuthClient and handles popup, cancellation, and gesture preservation issues.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordIdentity.t: Implements a React context/provider for password-based identities with localStorage persistence and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostAuthTimeout.ts: Adds timeout tracking for post-authentication phases, exposing elapsed time, timeout state, and reset controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, saving, and deleting the caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStalledAuthDetecti: Detects stalled authentication steps by timing phases and reporting stalled step, reason, and elapsed time.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and a chocolate-themed design system using OKLCH variables.
frontend/src/lib/aiClient.ts: Legacy unused AI client that throws an error if called.
frontend/src/lib/aiProxyClient.ts: Implements the AI proxy client with request types, validation, error handling, and parsing helpers for AI responses.
frontend/src/lib/onboardingPlaceholder.t: Provides storage helpers for onboarding data, including safe JSON parse and stringify functions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that creates the React root and wraps App with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Daily.tsx: Daily tasks page that loads AI‑generated tasks based on onboarding data and displays loading, error, or task views with a modal.
frontend/src/pages/Fridge.tsx: Fridge page showing hardcoded chocolate inventory totals with period toggles and header/footer layout.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with marketing hero section, feature carousel modal, and navigation buttons for signup and login.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Complex Internet Identity login flow handling validation, diagnostics, mobile fixes, timeouts, and post‑auth routing.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Multi‑step onboarding form that gathers user goals, calls AI to generate a plan, saves the profile, and manages authenticated navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: Signup page handling complex Internet Identity authentication flow with diagnostics, timeouts, mobile handling, and validation steps.
frontend/src/pages/SignupTest.tsx: Simplified backup signup page that triggers Internet Identity login and redirects to onboarding when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/SweetSummit.tsx: Displays the user’s personalized AI-generated plan after onboarding, with sections for goals and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyMountain.tsx: Fetches or loads cached weekly mountain goals based on onboarding results, handling loading, errors, and week-based caching.
frontend/src/utils/authDiagnostics.ts: Utility for structured auth flow logging, step timing, and correlated diagnostics.
frontend/src/utils/identityValidation.ts: Helpers to validate identities and detect stale sessions based on delegation and anonymity checks.
frontend/src/utils/passwordIdentity.ts: Creates deterministic Ed25519 identities from credentials and manages storing, restoring, and clearing them in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/platform.ts: Detects platform details, especially Chrome on Android, and caches results for performance.
frontend/src/utils/safeRender.ts: Provides helpers to safely convert unknown AI-returned values into strings and extract validated string fields without crashing React.
frontend/src/utils/sessionReset.ts: Clears all SweetSteps-related localStorage keys to reset client-side session state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins used by the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes current project state and requirements, focusing on fixing Internet Identity signup/login flows and related auth issues.
